title: EasyDriver framework configuration
description: Configuration file for test projects using EasyDriver

BrowserConfig.description: Options that define way how WebDriver managed browser is created/managed

BrowserName.description: Used to differentiate which driver to run. e.g. 'chrome'

BrowserPath.description: Path to browser executable e.g. c:/browsers/myChromium/chrome.exe

DriverPath.description: Path to driver executable e.g. c:/drivers/chromedriver.exe

Reconnect.description: If true: Framework will try to reconnect to already running browser

AutoClose.description: If true - browser will be automatically closed after end of main process. - Effectively after all tests.

Headless.description: If true - browser will run without UI.

DownloadPath.description: Where the browser should download files.

ProxyUrl.description: If set - Proxy will be used while browser creation.

WindowSize.description: Browser window size in format e.g. 1250x850 | maximized | default

TimeoutMs.description: Default timeout used in wait functions.

PoolingTimeMs.description: Time between retries during wait methods.

HighlightActions.description: If true - elements will be highlighted before UI actions to indicate them.

ExperimentalGetTextUsingJs.description: Much faster ILocator.Texts implementation. Use one call to Selenium (using JS) to get all texts.
